auth.registerSuccess: Registration successful, an email verification has been sent to your email

hero.title: NuxtPlus
hero.description: A full-stack framework based on Nuxt3, leveraging Vue3 ecosystem advantages to provide out-of-the-box AI integration, user management, and blog systems.

features.title: Features
features.description: NuxtPlus provides rich features and components to help you quickly build modern web applications.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: Based on Nuxt.js powerful performance optimization, ensuring your website loads quickly, responds rapidly, and delivers an excellent user experience.

components.title: Rich Components
components.description: Built-in preset components from navigation bars to footers, forms to cards, meeting various common UI needs and accelerating development.

theme.title: Theme System
theme.description: Support for light/dark mode switching and customizable theme variables, easily creating visual experiences that match your brand.

typescript.title: TypeScript Support
typescript.description: Full TypeScript support providing type-safe development experience, reducing errors and improving code quality and maintainability.

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: Built-in SEO best practices, automatically generating meta tags and structured data to help your website rank better in search engines.

api.title: API Integration
api.description: Simplify API calls and data fetching through built-in authentication and caching mechanisms, making frontend-backend interaction more convenient and efficient.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.description: Real feedback from our users, learn how they use NuxtPlus to improve development efficiency

card1.content: NuxtPlus has greatly accelerated our development process. The rich component library is easy to customize, allowing us to focus on business logic rather than UI implementation.
card1.name: Ms. Zhang

card2.content: As an independent developer, NuxtPlus provides me with a professional development experience, making my projects look like they were completed by a team.
card2.name: Mr. Li

card3.content: After migrating to NuxtPlus, our team's development efficiency increased by 30%. The theme system allows us to easily adapt to different brand requirements.
card3.name: Mr. Wang

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs. All plans include core features and can be upgraded or downgraded at any time.

free.title: Free
free.subtitle: Perfect for personal projects and learning

pro.title: Pro
pro.subtitle: Ideal for professional developers and small teams

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.subtitle: For large teams and enterprise needs

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: We've collected some questions you might ask. If you can't find the answer you're looking for, feel free to contact us.

what.question: What is NuxtPlus?
what.answer: NuxtPlus is a SaaS template built on Nuxt3, pre-integrated with Supabase Auth, internationalization, SEO, and Blog modules to help developers quickly build modern web applications.

footer.introduction: A modern Nuxt application framework integrating best practices and powerful component libraries.

about.title: About Us
about.introduction: NuxtPlus is a development framework built for creators. We are committed to providing a simple, powerful, and elegant solution that makes building modern web applications a real pleasure. Whether you are an independent developer, a startup, or a large enterprise, NuxtPlus can help you quickly launch and scale your projects.

meta.title: About Us - NuxtPlus
meta.description: NuxtPlus is a development framework for creators. Simple, powerful, and elegant, making it a joy to build modern web applications.
